name: $std-MA
desc: A meta-analysis of the individual participant data from individual studies or data sets.

name: $IPD-MA
desc: An indirect meta-analysis derived from 2 or more direct comparisons in a network meta-analysis.

name: $indirect-NMA
desc: An composite meta-analysis derived from direct comparisons and indirect comparisons in a network meta-analysis.

name: $combined-NMA
desc: A range of results across a body of evidence.

name: $range
desc: An approach describing a body of evidence by categorically classifying individual studies (eg 3 studies showed beneft and 2 studied found no effect).
